Methods in org.netbeans.spi.wizard with parameters of type WizardController
protected abstract  javax.swing.JComponent WizardPanelProvider.createPanel(WizardController controller, java.lang.String id, java.util.Map settings)

protected  void WizardPanelProvider.recycleExistingPanel(java.lang.String id, WizardController controller, java.util.Map wizardData, javax.swing.JComponent panel)
          The method provides a chance to call setProblem() or setCanFinish() when the user re-navigates to a panel they've already seen - in the case that the user pressed the Previous button and then the Next button.
